body: query { fulfillmentproviderlist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ fulfillmentproviders { id, name, provider { ... on Hashtag { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key } ... on ThreePL { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key, threepl_id, threepl_facility_id } }, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } } }
